summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6140 for the improvement of 27th Avenue South from Beacon Avenue to Brighton Street on the west; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85469, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
